name: Music Maniac
description:
Too many people are trying to get into your concert! Let in your true fans and drive away your paparazzi.

Use arrow keys to move up and down.
Press space to sing a note - the longer you hold, the louder you are! 

Press escape to end game. 

Created for Tufts SP2022 CS23 Midterm Project. 
By Jo Chung, Romello Harvey,  Phillip Kang, & James Endahl.
